vehicles.description: Several vehicles ahead in the same lane, including a white sedan directly in front of the ego car and a bus further ahead.
vehicles.explanation: These vehicles are influencing traffic flow and the ego car's potential maneuverability, potentially causing traffic to slow down or stop.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Pedestrians on the right sidewalk, parallel to the road, with one individual close to the crosswalk.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The ego car has to be vigilant of pedestrians that might enter the crosswalk, and prepare to yield or stop to let them pass safely.

traffic signs.description: A pedestrian crossing sign is visible on the right side of the road, positioned above a crosswalk.
traffic signs.explanation: This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk ahead, so the ego car must be alert to the possibility of pedestrians crossing and be prepared to stop to give them right of way.

traffic cones.description: Orange traffic cones on the left side of the ego car's lane.
traffic cones.explanation: These cones denote a partition in the road, which may narrow the driveable lane and require more attention from the ego car.

suggestions: Maintain a safe distance from the car ahead, be ready to stop, watch for pedestrians at the crosswalk, and navigate carefully around the traffic cones while staying in the lane. Also, stay alert to the traffic conditions in adjacent lanes as they might affect traffic flow and require the ego car to adjust speed or lane position.
